revision.text: ==Romani== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alt|rom|humer|xomer|khomer}} ===Etymology=== {{bor+|rom|xcl|խմոր|t=leaven, ferment, yeast}}.<ref name="bi">{{R:rom:Boretzky-Igla|xomér|page=117b}}</ref><ref name="h">{{cite-book|author=Ian Hancock|chapter=On Romani origins and identity|editor=Dileep Karanth|title=Danger! Educated Gypsy: Selected Essays|publisher=University of Hertfordshire Press|year=2010|page=69|pageurl=https://books.google.co.jp/books?id=yqmYJiVui9UC&pg=PA69&lpg=PA69#v=onepage&q&f=false|isbn=978-1-902806-98-3|accessdate=February 10, 2022}}</ref> ===Noun=== {{head|rom|noun|g=m|nominative plural|xumera|cat2=2-syllable words}} # [[dough]]<ref name="bi"/><ref name="h"/><ref>{{R:Courthiade:2009|entry=o xumer, -es- m. -a, -en-|page=174a}}</ref> ===References=== <references/> {{c|rom|Food and drink}}
